meanings.definition: The group of people who read a particular publication or who are considered likely to read it.
meanings.sent1: The readership of the magazine includes many young adults.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper's readership has been steadily increasing over the years.
meanings.sent3: The readership eagerly awaited the release of the new book.
meanings.sent4: Her readership at the library was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The readership of the blog was so large that it crashed the server.

meanings.definition: The act of reading or the state of being a reader.
meanings.sent1: His readership of novels began at a young age.
meanings.sent2: She developed a love for readership after discovering poetry.
meanings.sent3: The cat's readership of the newspaper was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The readership of the book club was like a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: The readership of the textbook was so engaging that she finished it in one sitting.
